subject: Pro X Ultra Pedals Available in German warehouse?
description_text:
Hello,

I am currently considering ordering the “Simsonn Pro X Ultra Pedals with 
Baseplate” with delivery to Germany. On Aliexpress, I can see that 
shipping is also from Germany, so I don't expect any surprises with 
customs. However, the price here is significantly better. Will shipping 
also be from Germany, and is tax already included?

best regards
Philip

conversations.body_text: Hi Philip Schmalz, Our German warehouse will be restocked soon. You may also check with AliExpress customer service to confirm current stock availability. In general, EU orders are shipped from our German warehouse.
